desc: This is a helper module for the JC Pro Macro 2 Pad. It needs appropiate code on the board!
name: MacroPad

desc: A table with an LED definition for the Mute buttons
name: muteLED

desc: The Serial port where the MacroPad is connected.
name: serialPort

desc: It toggles the raised hand state on the first application it finds.
name: raiseHand

desc: It toggles the microphone mute state on the first application it finds.
name: toggleMute
